short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collect, organize, annotate and cite your research papers in Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Note: If you see a warning about Paperpile's extension "being not supported soon", you can safely ignore it. Exciting new features are coming to Paperpile and its extension, which will be rolled out automatically in the coming weeks.

This extension works with Paperpile, a clean and simple reference and citation manager. Sign up for Paperpile at https://paperpile.com

Students, researchers, scientists, doctors, postdocs, PIs, and professors üíõ Paperpile:

‚úì Import citations and PDFs from hundreds of publisher sites including Nature, Science, Springer, ScienceDirect, Wiley and many more
‚úì Deep integration with PubMed, Google Scholar, ArXiv, Scopus, Web of Science, ProQuest, EBSCO, and hundreds of University library catalogues
‚úì Easy migration from other reference managers like Mendeley, Endnote, EasyBib, and Zotero

‚≠êÔ∏è PDF tools you will love
‚úì Annotate PDFs directly in Chrome with Paperpile's built-in PDF viewer
‚úì Sync your papers automatically to Google Drive. 
‚úì One-click full-text PDF download from hundreds of publisher sites and preprint archives
‚úì EZProxy support: full text PDF download off-campus

‚≠êÔ∏è Add citations and bibliographies in Google Docs
‚úì A truly collaborative reference management solution for Google Docs
‚úì More than 9,000 citation styles including APA, MLA, Harvard and Chicago
